DOC.brief_title: An Allergen BioCube ( ABC ) Study Evaluating Efficacy Fluticasone Propionate Nasal Spray Compared Placebo
DOC.criteria: provide write informed consent sign HIPAA form ; able willing follow instruction attend study visit ; female childbearing potential , pregnant , nurse planning pregnancy , willing submit pregnancy test Visit 1 exit visit , use adequate method birth control positive history seasonal allergic rhinitis ragweed ; positive skin test reaction ragweed within past 24 month ; manifest sufficient allergic rhinitis symptom ragweed exposure ABC know intolerance allergy antihistamine corticosteroid ; compromise lung function Visit 1 ; develop compromise lung function Visits 26 presence active sinus nasal infection visit ; experience acute upper low respiratory tract infection acute sinusitis within 30 day visit 1 ; significant nasal anatomical deformity condition allow subject breathe nose ( include , limited : septal deviation , septal perforation , nasal polyp , rhinitis medicamentosa ) nasal surgical intervention past ; know history glaucoma plan surgery ( nasal , ocular systemic ) trial period within 30 day thereafter ; inability refusal discontinue contact lens wear visit ; use disallow medication study appropriate prestudy washout period
